description: Tools for generating large-scale data sets for perception-based machine learning training and validation
name: com.unity.perception

samples.description: These files accompany the Perception Tutorial, found at https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/com.unity.perception
These files accompany the Human Pose Labeling and Randomization Tutorial, found at https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/com.unity.perception
A set of small sample HDRP scenes demonstrating how to set up various labelers
Sample Scene including objects on a conveyor belt
